txt_en: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
txt_cn: 幸福是努力工作带来的成就感。

txt_en: Everyone deserves to be happy.
txt_cn: 快乐属于每一个人。

txt_en: People shouldn’t brood around their past.
txt_cn: 不要沉溺于过往之中。

txt_en: The youth is the hope of our future.
txt_cn: 青年是未来的希望。

txt_en: It's summer! We're supposed to be having fun!
txt_cn: 夏天来了，一起开启快乐！

txt_en: People change and things work out.
txt_cn: 成功在于变通。

txt_en: Where there's pain, there's life.
txt_cn: 有苦有痛，才叫人生。

txt_en: Nothing's more powerful than a mother's love.
txt_cn: 没有什么比母爱更强大。

txt_en: You never know what you're capable of until you try.
txt_cn: 如果不勇于尝试，你永远不知道自己有多强大。

txt_en: There's more honor in defeat than there is in unused potential.
txt_cn: 潜龙无用，虽败犹荣。

txt_en: Who we were does not dictate who we will be.
txt_cn: 过去都已过去，未来由我们自己决定。

txt_en: There is so much beauty in the world.
txt_cn: 大千世界，无限美好。

txt_en: We will find hope in the impossible.
txt_cn: 无望之中也能发现希望。

txt_en: The beauty of life can spring forth from even the harshest of climates.
txt_cn: 艰难之境亦见生活之美。

txt_en: The more you get hit, the harder you fight.
txt_cn: 经历的击打越多，你的勇气越盛。

txt_en: Learn from loss and your day will come.
txt_cn: 要想成功，就要学会从失去中汲取经验。

txt_en: Helping others makes our own lives better and makes us better people.
txt_cn: 赠人玫瑰，手有余香。

txt_en: You don't always have to fight to win.
txt_cn: 输赢并不总是那么重要。

txt_en: Every ending is a new beginning.
txt_cn: 每次结束都意味着一个新的开始。

txt_en: I'll always love you, no matter where I am.
txt_cn: 无论身处何地，我将永远爱你。

txt_en: The only way to keep going is to take control of your life.
txt_cn: 掌控自我人生，不断砥砺前行。

txt_en: You steer ahead. You are the captain now.
txt_cn: 你的人生航向由你做主。

txt_en: Let your heart guide you.
txt_cn: 跟随心的方向。

txt_en: Problems are just opportunities that haven't presented themselves.
txt_cn: 困难亦是潜在的机会。

txt_en: Even the best make mistakes sometimes.
txt_cn: 人非圣贤，孰能无过。

txt_en: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today.
txt_cn: 不为昨日遗憾，把握当下人生。

txt_en: Learning is always a painful process.
txt_cn: 学习的过程中总要经历一些痛苦。

txt_en: Life is good, but it can be better.
txt_cn: 生活可以更美好。

txt_en: A mistake today stops you making it tomorrow.
txt_cn: 吃一堑，长一智。
